00046   inline DFLib::LatLon::Report::Report(const vector<double> &theLocation,
00047                                        const double &Bearing,const double &std_dev,
00048                                        const string &theName)
00049     : receiverLocation(theLocation),
00050       bearing(Bearing*M_PI/180.0),
00051       sigma(std_dev*M_PI/180.0)
00052   {
00053     setReportName(theName);
00054     // Make sure our bearing is *always* 0<bearing<2pi.  If it isn't,
00055     // reset it:
00056     while (bearing < 0)
00057       bearing += 2*M_PI;
00058   }        
00059 
00060   inline DFLib::LatLon::Report::~Report()
00061   {
00062   }
00063 
00064   inline double DFLib::LatLon::Report::getReportBearingRadians() const
00065   {
00066     // bearing *must* be in 0<bearing<2*pi
00067     return bearing;
00068   }
00069   inline double DFLib::LatLon::Report::getBearing() const
00070   {
00071     // always return bearing in range 0-360 degrees
00072     return (getReportBearingRadians()*180.0/M_PI);
00073   }
00074 
00075   inline double DFLib::LatLon::Report::getBearingStandardDeviationRadians() const
00076   {
00077     return sigma;
00078   }
00079   inline double DFLib::LatLon::Report::getSigma() const
00080   {
00081     return sigma*180/M_PI;
00082   }

00094   inline const vector<double> & DFLib::LatLon::Report::getReceiverLocation()

00098 
00099   inline void DFLib::LatLon::Report::setBearing(double Bearing)
00100   {
00101     // bearing *must* be in 0<bearing<2*pi
00102     bearing=Bearing*M_PI/180.0;
00103     while (bearing < 0)
00104       bearing += 2*M_PI;
00105   }
00106   inline void DFLib::LatLon::Report::setSigma(double Sigma)
00107   {
00108     sigma=Sigma*M_PI/180;
00109   }
